creditline: The Miscellaneous Works of Art Purchase Fund by exchange
description: panel, silk brocade with architectural motifs, corners and edges with silver metallic embroidery
medium: Silk and metallic threads; complex weave with discontinuous weft patterning
text: Always anxious to be innovative, 18th century French designers explored many decorative options and, at times, included many unusual elements in their patterns. During the second quarter of the eighteenth century, a number of designs incorporating architectural elements became popular.
title: Brocade Panel
